item.title: Russian Superstitions
item.description: Etiquette Besides being amusing and interesting, it’s useful to know some of these. A number of them have become social norms or etiquette. For example, don’t shake hands on the threshold. Donâ€™t give an even number of flowers unless it’s for a funeral.
